name: Jewel Drop - Block Popping Fun Game
name_original: Jewel Drop - Block Popping Fun Game
description:
Match and Pop the sparkling colourful jewels and get the jewellery gift boxes to the customers
Remove the blocks so that the jewelry drops to the bottom and is collected
Fill the customer’s order to get coins as tips.
Keep them happy with bonus solitaire diamonds and amazing necklace and earring sets to get more tips.
Get a helping hand with Special power boosters can be used to win the difficult challenges
Use the coins to upgrade the jewelry quality and earn more tips.
Unlock different decorations to make your jewelry shop look amazing and become the best shop on the block
Lots of levels to finish. Win stars and trophies !

FEATURES
1] Great fun for the whole family with simple pop the same colored blocks game play
2] No In app purchase needed. Get free coins every hour to get the extra boost.
3] Power ups to blast through lines and blocks
4] Special items like solitaire diamond and jewelry collection to win bonus coins
5] Numerous levels with trophies to win and awesome burger shop decor to unlock
6] Full Game for FREE. No in app purchase items.
